description: The `ballerinax/sap.s4hana.api_inbound_delivery_srv_0002` package offers APIs for seamless integration with the [Inbound Delivery API v2.2.0](https://api.sap.com/api/API_INBOUND_DELIVERY_SRV_0002/overview). This service enables users to create, read, update and delete inbound deliveries.
